title: Azure Policy Compliance Dashboard
vision: A comprehensive Azure Policy compliance dashboard showing an overall compliance score (donut gauge or percentage), non-compliant resources grouped by policy initiative with expandable sections, and a remediation tasks list with status, affected resources, and action buttons. Follows standard Azure portal dashboard layout with Coherence components.
problem: Azure administrators lack a single-pane-of-glass view to understand their overall policy compliance posture, identify which initiatives have the most non-compliant resources, and track remediation progress — forcing them to navigate multiple blades.
successCriteria: Overall compliance score displayed as a donut gauge with percentage
Non-compliant resources grouped by policy initiative with counts and severity
Expandable initiative sections showing individual non-compliant resources
Remediation tasks list with status badges, affected resource counts, and action buttons
Summary cards for total policies, compliant vs non-compliant counts, and pending remediations
Filtering and sorting capabilities on the resource and task lists
nonGoals: Real-time data from Azure Resource Graph
constraints: Mock data only — no live Azure connections
Use shared patterns (PageHeader, DonutGauge) from patterns directory
